answer.answer:
Expensfiy is an expense management system for your business. It supports receipt scanning, multi-user access, next-day reimbursements and also compiles expense reports, among many other features!

Just tap the button below and head to the "Offers" section in your Business Account to find out more!

Also, you can find out more about Expensify, here.

Square is a mobile payments company that allows you to start taking payments straight away in person, over the phone, via invoice or online! 

All you need to do is open an account with them. And as a Monzo Business Account holder you'll have access to exclusive offers on new Square accounts ðŸŽ‰

Just tap the button below and head to the "Offers" section in your Business Account to find out more!

Expensfiy is an expense management system for your business. It supports receipt scanning, multi-user access, next-day reimbursements and also compiles expense reports, among many other features!

Just tap the button below and head to the "Offers" section in your Business Account to find out more! 
 
Also, you can find out more about Expensify, [here](https://use.expensify.com/).

At Monzo we don't yet offer any lending products for businesses, however this is something we'd love to do in the future. ðŸ’°

However; if you run a Limited Company, you might be eligible for a loan with our partner Funding Xchange. 

Funding Xchange is a lending aggregator platform, where you will find a range of lending options so you can pick which one is most suitable for your needs. 

If you want to have a look at what options are available to you, head to your "Account" tab by tapping the button below and tap on "Loans and funding". ðŸ‘€
